name: IDeA Europe Foundation
headAddress: Square du Val de la Cambre 16
goal: Development of social and economic initiatives with the purpose to foster development of emerging countries, with a first implementation in Armenia. Themes considered: economic development (ideation and implementation of impact investments projects), social development (creation of jobs, development of educational infrastructures...), humanitarian topics (fostering humanitarian values, reflection on migration and integration issues, humanitarian prize...).
interests: Culture, Education and training, Enlargement, European Neighbourhood Policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Migration and asylum, Research and innovation, Youth
euInitiatives: Horizon Europe, EU for Innovation, Neighbourhood policy, Eastern Partnership,  Erasmus+, EIP, grant schemes available for Armenia
